name: Leaves' Eyes
description:
'''Leaves' Eyes''' is a [[symphonic metal]] band based in Germany. Formed in 2003 by [[Liv Kristine]], formerly the lead singer of [[Theatre of Tragedy]], along with the entire line-up of [[Atrocity (band)|Atrocity]], the band has since released eight studio albums, a single, six EPs, one live album, and a DVD.

Most of Leaves' Eyes' lyrics, written by Liv Kristine until her departure in 2016, focus on [[Norse mythology]] and the [[Viking Age]]. The melodic vocals of Liv Kristine and her successor, [[Elina Siirala]], are occasionally complemented by [[death growl]] vocals from Krull, a vocal style Kristine refers to as "[[Gothic/doom|beauty and the beast]]".
